Returns: a new KeyListener instance that wraps keyListener.
getKeyListener(android.text.method.KeyLi.Description: Attaches EmojiCompat KeyListener to the widget. Should be called from @B_android#widget#TextView#setKeyListener_E@. Existing keyListener is wrapped into EmojiCompat KeyListener. When used on devices running API 18 or below, this method returns keyListener that is given as a parameter.

Parameters: int: maximum number of EmojiSpans to be added to a single CharSequence, should be equal or greater than 0
setMaxEmojiCount(int).Description: Set the maximum number of EmojiSpans to be added to a CharSequence. The number of spans in a CharSequence affects the performance of the EditText insert/delete operations. Insert/delete operations slow down as the number of spans increases.

getMaxEmojiCount().Description: Returns the maximum number of EmojiSpans to be added to a CharSequence.

ClassDesc: Utility class to enhance custom EditText widgets with @B_android#support#text#emoji#EmojiCompat_E@.
